styles.css: list-style-type: none; padding-left: 1rem; & li {position: relative; list-style-type: none; padding-left: 1.2em; margin-bottom: .5rem;} & li::before{content: '+'; display: block; position: absolute; left: 0; top :-.1rem; padding: 0 .9rem; margin-left: -2.25rem; border-radius: 50%; background: var(--wp--preset--color--primary); color: var(--wp--preset--color--white-ice);} & li.is-style-icecubo-cancel-list::before { content: '-'; left: 3px;padding: 0 1rem;margin-left: -2.4rem;}
